hero.title: Take Charge of Your Career and Begin Earning Now
hero.desc: No company, no limits! Sign up now, work your own way, and get paid fast. Everything you need to succeed all in one app. What are you waiting for?
hero.content: Over 50,000 Brokers are already utilizing our app.

1.title: Effortless Commission Tracking
1.sub-desc: Easily track your commissions, requests, and payouts in one transparent and user-friendly platform.

2.title: Direct Access to Leading Developers
2.sub-desc: Connect and collaborate with over 200 trusted developers like ORA and Talat Mostafa—no middlemen, no delays.

3.title: Mobile-Optimized Experience
3.sub-desc: Work from anywhere with a smooth, user-friendly mobile interface designed for brokers on the go.

partners.title: Trusted By Industry Leaders Over 200 Partners Top Developers in the Field

services.title: What We Provide ?
services.desc: From managing property listings to tracking commissions, Brokers Hub provides all the tools you need to expand your business.

1.title: Effortless Listing Management
1.sub-desc: Easily add, edit, and showcase properties with just a few taps. Keep your listings current anytime, anywhere.

2.title: Earn When You Invite Others
2.sub-desc: Allows users to earn rewards by referring new people to the platform.

3.title: Instant Notifications
3.sub-desc: Get real-time updates on new leads, client feedback, and upcoming meetings to stay informed.

4.title: Track Your Earnings with Ease
4.sub-desc: Easily monitor your earnings. Brokers Hub guarantees transparent tracking so you receive the commissions you deserve.

1.title: Sign up and build your profile
1.sub-desc: Download the app, register and showcase your expertise and working area.

2.title: Find hot deals around you
2.sub-desc: Find clients or properties near you. Filter by type, location, or price range.

3.title: Close the deal and log it
3.sub-desc: Confirm the deal in the app and get reviewed by the client. It builds your reputation.

4.title: Get your commission instantly
4.sub-desc: Once the deal is confirmed, your commission is added to your wallet and ready to withdraw.

downloadApp.title: Get Started Now
downloadApp.desc: Ready to get started? Download now and join thousands of brokers.

testimonials.title: User Testimonials
testimonials.desc: Listen to the experiences of brokers and developers who trust Brokers Hub daily.

1.sub-desc: ‘’ I can easily manage my clients' portfolios and execute trades seamlessly. The intuitive interface and powerful analytics tools keep me competitive in the market. Highly recommended! ’’
1.name: Khaled Ahmed

2.sub-desc: ‘’ This app is revolutionary! The features are user-friendly, and I love the detailed reporting tools. As a day trader, I depend on precise data, and this platform delivers. My productivity has skyrocketed! ’’
2.name: Ahmed Salem

3.sub-desc: ‘’ Brokers Hub has changed the way I manage my listings and track commissions. It's the all-in-one solution that has truly helped my business flourish! ’’
3.name: Mohamed Amr

footer.footerTitle: Brokers Hub gives you the freedom to broker your way no limits, no middlemen, just opportunities.
